name: Wehr and Tehr's Temporal Troubles
description: Wehr and Tehr's Temporal Troubles follows Tehr, a scientist who scattered the other scientist's rug around the lab. Each piece is restricted by puzzles that are required to be solved with the use of a time machine. The time machine allows Tehr to go back in time and watch his previous selves carry out what he did prior to traveling which always him to be 2, 3, 4, or even 5 places at once to solve a puzzle and get back that rug!
